commits.message: Fixes cfg attributes in runtime macro (#6410)
Adds `BlockNumberProvider` in multisig, proxy and nft pallets (#5723)
Removes constraint in `BlockNumberProvider` from treasury (#6522)
Adds support for generics in`derive-impl` (#5584)
Fixes doc links for `procedural` crate (#5023)
Fixes warnings in `frame-support-procedural` crate (#4915)
Use real rust type for pallet alias in `runtime` macro (#4769)
Fixes runtime type with doc parsing in derive_impl (#2594)
Moves all test runtimes to use `derive_impl` (#2409)
Fixes import path in benchmark macro (#2437)
Skip zombienet CI job until PolkadotJS includes `SkipCheckIfFeeless` extension (#2294)
Adds syntax for marking calls feeless (#1926)
Adds instance support for composite enums (#1857)
Fixes path issue in derive-impl (#1823)
Adds base benchmark for do_tick in broker pallet (#1235)
Renames API (#1186)
Adds ability to provide defaults for types provided by `construct_runtime` (#14682)
Fixes CI (#14763)
Moves `Block` to `frame_system` instead of `construct_runtime` and removes `Header` and `BlockNumber` (#2790)
Moves `Block` to `frame_system` instead of `construct_runtime` and removes `Header` and `BlockNumber` (#7431)
Moves `Block` to `frame_system` instead of `construct_runtime` and removes `Header` and `BlockNumber` (#14437)
Removes `pallet::call_index` from `dev_mode` example (#14492)
[FRAME Core] Adds ability to split a pallet across multiple files (#13950)
Adds ability to use default hasher in `dev_mode` for explicit key binding (#14164)
Clears Old Storage for Session pallet (#7132)
Offences Migration v1: Removes `ReportsByKindIndex` (#7114)
Removes ReportsByKindIndex (#13936)
Adds force_origin support (#13845)
Adds example for dev_mode and updates doc (#13944)

reviews.pr_title: Update Scheduler to Support Relay Chain Block Number Provider
Task(bump) Pallet Salary
Add defaults for pallet-xcm
`CheckNonce`: Provide a way to pass an optional default nonce
Improvements in solochain template
Fixes cfg attributes in runtime macro
Adds `BlockNumberProvider` in multisig, proxy and nft pallets
Support more types in TypeWithDefault
Removes constraint in `BlockNumberProvider` from treasury
Mention that account might still be required in doc for feeless if.
Introduces `TypeWithDefault<T, D: Get<T>>`
Document the process to launch your first (omni) node
Setting BlockNumber as u32 in tests for alliance pallet
update solochain to use #[runtime]
Adds support for generics in`derive-impl`
Introduce new `DefaultConfig`s to remove boilerplate code from SP runtimes using `derive_impl`
Adds example for custom default configs
pallet macro: do not generate try-runtime related code when frame-support doesn't have try-runtime.
Fixes doc links for `procedural` crate
Update the template synchronization script
relaxing timepoint constraint for multisig
Update Templates README docs
allow clear_origin in safe xcm builder
upgrade to macro_magic 0.5.1
Fixes warnings in `frame-support-procedural` crate
[Staking] Delegators can stake but stakers can't delegate
Add Dockerfiles to the templates
Mention the signed extensions in the reference docs
Use real rust type for pallet alias in `runtime` macro
Frame: `Consideration` trait generic over `Footprint` and indicates zero cost
refactor: parachain template
Fixes nonce issue with feeless calls
remove pallet::getter usage from pallet-timestamp
Impl and use default config for pallet-staking in tests
add ref doc for logging practices in FRAME
Use aggregated types for `RuntimeFreezeReason` and better examples of `MaxFreezes`
Update the pallet guide in `sdk-docs`
Revamp the Readme of the parachain template
Removes production configs for `derive_impl` and updates system config
frame/proc-macro: Refactor code for better readability
Frame Pallets: Clean a lot of test setups
Revamp the Readme of the minimal template
Better error for missing index in CRV2
Use Unlicense for templates
Adds ability to specify chain type in chain-spec-builder
Publish `chain-spec-builder`
Unique Usernames in Identity Pallet
Remove workspace lints from templates
Ensure correct variant count in `Runtime[Hold/Freeze]Reason`
Publish `polkadot-sdk-frame`  crate
Improvements in minimal template
Adds ability to trigger tasks via unsigned transactions
Fix case in type in macro generation
Improve doc for pallet macro and config macro
pallet assets: Fix errors
Deploy `pallet-parameters` to rococo and fix dynamic_params name expand
Synchronize templates
XCM builder pattern improvement - Accept `impl Into<T>` instead of just `T`
Renames `frame` crate to `polkadot-sdk-frame`
[Backport] Reformat release notes generation
[Backport] version bumps and prdocs reordering 1.9.0
Benchmarking: Add pov_mode to V2 syntax
removed `pallet::getter` usage from cumulus pallets
Removes `as [disambiguation_path]` from `derive_impl` usage
FRAME: Create `TransactionExtension` as a replacement for `SignedExtension`
Repot all templates into a single directory
Remove `as frame_system::DefaultConfig` from the required syntax in `derive_impl`
Fix call enum's metadata regression
frame-support: Improve error reporting when having too many pallets
Remove redundant parachains assigner pallet.
removed `pallet::getter` from `pallet-sudo`
Snowbridge - Test pallet order
[FRAME Core] remove unnecessary overrides while using derive_impl for frame_system
[FRAME] Consistently use u64 as BlockNumber on FRAME tests
[FRAME] Parameters pallet
Adds syntax for marking calls feeless
[frame] `#[pallet::composite_enum]` improved variant count handling + removed `pallet_balances`'s `MaxHolds` config
Switch All `construct_runtime`s to New Syntax
pallet-sudo: Accept `Root` origin as valid sudo
frame-support: Print key as hex for corrupted state
Add dummy impls of `fungible` and `fungibles` trait families
[NPoS] Remove better solution threshold for unsigned submissions
pallet-uniques: Move migration over to `VersionedMigration`
Adds derive_impl to relay-chain and parachain runtimes
bump zombienet version `v1.3.82`
Moves all test runtimes to use `derive_impl`
Add `(Partial)OrdNoBound` derive macros
[FRAME] Make MQ pallet re-entrancy safe
pub `keystore_accounts/accounts_from_keys` for offchain Signer
Create new trait for non-dedup storage decode
Improve `try-state` developer experience & fix bug
Remove kusama and polkadot SP constants from parachains-common
Development Environment Advice Reference Doc
parachain-system: Do not take `self` for `last_relay_block_number`
XCM builder pattern
Fix PRdoc that have been previously drafted with older schema
Improve Client CLI help readability
Different XCM builders, default one requires fee payment
Publish `penpal-runtime` crate
`polkadot-parachain-primitives` should not depend on `frame-support`.
